item.title: Management Processes: Quality
item.description: Project Management Processes Develop project management strategies for managing your project's Quality, Costs, Schedule, Risks, Communication, Procurement and Human Resources Quality Management Plan Build quality management into your projects righ from the start. Define your quality management to include Quality Assurance, Scope management and Change, Testing, Defect Repair strategies.. Free Trial Â» Cost Management Plan Manage your project's budget by ensuring an effective cost management strategy is in place.
